modShortDescription: A surprisingly intact BRDM-2 military vehicle! Slow speed and poor handling, but holds a lot of fuel and has 90 slots of storage.
modDescription:
A surprisingly intact BRDM-2 military [vehicle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/)! Slow speed and poor handling, but holds a lot of fuel and has 90 slots of storage.

Holds up to 6 people. Requires Grease Monkey 5.

## Changelog

Added new engine/horn sounds.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/bdubyah/Mods---A19/tree/master/BRDM2)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/bdubyah/Mods---A18/tree/master/BRDM2)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11875-bdubyahs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Bdubyah](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/bdubyah/)
